welcome.title: Hello! I'm your AI career advisor.
welcome.subtitle: I've analyzed your assessment and I'm here to help you explore career paths, answer questions, and provide personalized guidance.
welcome.profile: Based on your profile, I can see you have strong interests in design and technology. I've identified several career paths that align well with your skills and interests.
welcome.whatToExplore: What would you like to explore first? You can ask me about:

topics.nextSteps: Next steps in your career journey

welcome.cta: Feel free to ask me anything!

input.placeholder: Ask me about your career path...

thinking.analyzing: Analyzing your question and preparing a response...

changeProfile.description: You can update your profile information or retake the assessment to get new recommendations.

features.title: Everything You Need to Find Your Perfect Career
features.subtitle: Our AI-powered platform provides comprehensive career guidance tailored to your unique profile and aspirations.

aiAdvisor.title: AI Career Advisor
aiAdvisor.description: Get personalized career recommendations powered by advanced AI algorithms that understand your unique skills and interests.

skillGap.title: Skill Gap Analysis
skillGap.description: Identify exactly what skills you need to develop for your target career with detailed gap analysis and learning roadmaps.

jobUpdates.title: Live Job Updates
jobUpdates.description: Stay updated with the latest job opportunities that match your profile and career goals in real-time.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in just 3 simple steps

assessment.title: Take Assessment
assessment.description: Complete our comprehensive career assessment to help us understand your skills, interests, and goals.

analysis.title: Get AI Analysis
analysis.description: Our AI analyzes your responses and matches you with careers that align with your profile and market demand.

journey.title: Start Your Journey
journey.description: Receive personalized learning paths, job recommendations, and ongoing guidance to achieve your career goals.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated on Career Trends
newsletter.subtitle: Get weekly insights on job market trends, skill demands, and career opportunities delivered to your inbox.
newsletter.thankYou: Thank you for subscribing! Check your email for confirmation.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Your Dream Career?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students and professionals who have found their ideal career path with our AI-powered guidance.
